TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IObserver`1<- T>
generic <typename T> public interface class IObserver

span.span: The object that provides notification information.

summary.span: 提供接收推播通知的機制。

span.span: Provides a mechanism for receiving push-based notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和介面提供推播通知，也就是觀察者設計模式的通用的機制。The and interfaces provide a generalized mechanism for push-based notification, also known as the observer design pattern. 介面表示類別，用於傳送通知 （提供者）;介面表示類別，用於接收到 (observer)。The interface represents the class that sends notifications (the provider); the interface represents the class that receives them (the observer). `T` 代表提供通知資訊的類別。`T` represents the class that provides the notification information. 實作來排列，從提供者會收到通知 (實作) 本身的執行個體傳遞到提供者的方法。An implementation arranges to receive notifications from a provider (an implementation) by passing an instance of itself to the provider's method. 這個方法會傳回物件可以用來取消訂閱的觀察者的提供者之前，完成傳送通知。This method returns an object that can be used to unsubscribe the observer before the provider finishes sending notifications. 介面會定義觀察者必須實作下列三種方法：The interface defines the following three methods that the observer must implement: - 方法，通常會呼叫提供者會提供觀察者，以新的資料或狀態資訊。The method, which is typically called by the provider to supply the observer with new data or state information. - 方法，通常會呼叫提供者，表示資料是無法使用，無法存取，或已損毀，或此提供者發生某些錯誤狀況。The method, which is typically called by the provider to indicate that data is unavailable, inaccessible, or corrupted, or that the provider has experienced some other error condition. - 方法，以指出它已完成傳送通知給觀察者的提供者通常會呼叫這個方法。The method, which is typically called by the provider to indicate that it has finished sending notifications to observers. ## Examples 下列範例說明觀察者設計模式。The following example illustrates the observer design pattern. 它會定義`Location`類別，其中包含緯度與經度的資訊。It defines a `Location` class that contains latitude and longitude information. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#5)] `LocationReporter`類別提供實作。The `LocationReporter` class provides the implementation. 在主控台顯示目前位置相關資訊。It displays information about the current location to the console. 其建構函式包含`name`參數，可讓`LocationReporter`其字串輸出中識別本身的執行個體。Its constructor includes a `name` parameter, which allows the `LocationReporter` instance to identify itself in its string output. 它也包含`Subscribe`方法，這個方法會包裝對提供者的呼叫方法。It also includes a `Subscribe` method, which wraps a call to the provider's method. 這可讓方法將傳回指定私用變數的參考。This enables the method to assign the returned reference to a private variable. `LocationReporter`類別也包含`Unsubscribe`方法，它會呼叫方法所傳回的物件方法。The `LocationReporter` class also includes an `Unsubscribe` method, which calls the method of the object returned by the method. 下列程式碼定義`LocationReporter`類別。The following code defines the `LocationReporter` class. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/observer.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/observer.vb#8)] `LocationTracker`類別提供實作。The `LocationTracker` class provides the implementation. 其`TrackLocation`方法會傳遞可為 null`Location`包含經度和緯度資料的物件。Its `TrackLocation` method is passed a nullable `Location` object that contains the latitude and longitude data. 如果`Location`值不是`null`，則`TrackLocation`方法呼叫的每個觀察者的方法。If the `Location` value is not `null`, the `TrackLocation` method calls the method of each observer. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#6)] 如果`Location`值是`null`，則`TrackLocation`方法具現化`LocationNotFoundException`物件，下列範例所示。If the `Location` value is `null`, the `TrackLocation` method instantiates a `LocationNotFoundException` object, which is shown in the following example. 然後它會呼叫每個觀察者方法並將它傳遞`LocationNotFoundException`物件。It then calls each observer's method and passes it the `LocationNotFoundException` object. 請注意，`LocationNotFoundException`衍生自但不會加入任何新的成員。Note that `LocationNotFoundException` derives from but does not add any new members. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#7)] 觀察器註冊以接收通知`TrackLocation`物件，藉由呼叫其方法，將觀察者物件的參考指派給私用泛型物件。Observers register to receive notifications from a `TrackLocation` object by calling its method, which assigns a reference to the observer object to a private generic object. 此方法會傳回`Unsubscriber`物件，它是實作，可讓觀察者停止接收通知。The method returns an `Unsubscriber` object, which is an implementation that enables observers to stop receiving notifications. `LocationTracker`類別也包含`EndTransmission`方法。The `LocationTracker` class also includes an `EndTransmission` method. 任何其他的位置資料可用時，此方法會呼叫每個觀察者方法然後清除 觀察者的內部清單。When no further location data is available, the method calls each observer's method and then clears the internal list of observers. 提供者和觀察者，然後具現化下列程式碼。The following code then instantiates the provider and the observer. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/program.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/module1.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnCompleted() cil managed

summary.span: 通知觀察者，提供者已完成傳送推播通知。

span.span: Notifies the observer that the provider has finished sending push-based notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當觀察者的實作稱為方法可以選擇性地呼叫方法呼叫時傳回給觀察者的物件方法。When the observer's implementation is called, the method can optionally call the method of the object that was returned to the observer when it called the method. ## Examples 下列範例提供的實作經緯度追蹤應用程式中的方法。The following example provides an implementation of the method in a latitude/longitude tracking application. 此方法只會報告任何其他資料可用，並呼叫提供者的實作。The method simply reports that no further data is available and calls the provider's implementation. 請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的主題的完整範例。See the Example section of the topic for the complete example. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/observer.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/observer.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnError(class System.Exception error) cil managed

param.name: error
param.span: 提供錯誤其他資訊的物件。

span.span: An object that provides additional information about the error.

summary.span: 通知觀察器此提供者發生錯誤狀況。

span.span: Notifies the observer that the provider has experienced an error condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然`error`是衍生自物件，它不一定代表提供者所擲回例外狀況。Although `error` is an object that is derived from , it does not necessarily represent an exception that is thrown by the provider. 它也可以代表例行性或預期的錯誤條件，例如遺失或無法使用的資料。It can also represent a routine or expected error condition, such as data that is missing or unavailable. 方法應該會被視為參考，和提供者不應預期要提供錯誤處理觀察者。The method should be seen as informational, and the provider should not expect the observer to provide error handling. ## Examples 下列範例提供的實作經緯度追蹤應用程式中的方法。The following example provides an implementation of the method in a latitude/longitude tracking application. 方法只會報告資料目前無法使用;不會使用物件做為參數傳遞給它。The method simply reports that data is currently unavailable; it does not make use of the object passed to it as a parameter. 請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的主題的完整範例。See the Example section of the topic for the complete example. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/observer.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/observer.vb#10)]

related.span: 觀察器設計模式最佳作法

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnNext(!T value) cil managed

span.span: Provides the observer with new data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 觀察者已呼叫的提供者之後方法，提供者會呼叫觀察者的方法，以提供通知。After an observer has called a provider's method, the provider calls the observer's method to provide notifications. ## Examples 下列範例提供的實作經緯度追蹤應用程式中的方法。The following example provides an implementation of the method in a latitude/longitude tracking application. 請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的主題的完整範例。See the Example section of the topic for the complete example. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/observer.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/observer.vb#12)]
